Length	226
Function	May control axon guidance across the CNS (PubMed:28859078). Prevents the delivery of ROBO1 at the cell surface and down-regulates its expression (PubMed:28859078).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum-Golgi intermediate compartment membrane; Cell membrane
